AddTags.name: AddTags
AddTags.description:
Adds one or more tags to an object, up to a limit of 10. Each tag consists of a key
                                                and an optional value

CreateBatchPrediction.name: CreateBatchPrediction
CreateBatchPrediction.description: Generates predictions for a group of observations

CreateDataSourceFromRDS.name: CreateDataSourceFromRDS
CreateDataSourceFromRDS.description: Creates a DataSource object from an Amazon RDS

CreateDataSourceFromRedshift.name: CreateDataSourceFromRedshift
CreateDataSourceFromRedshift.description: Creates a DataSource from a database hosted on an Amazon Redshift cluster

CreateDataSourceFromS3.name: CreateDataSourceFromS3
CreateDataSourceFromS3.description: Creates a DataSource object from S3

CreateEvaluation.name: CreateEvaluation
CreateEvaluation.description: Creates a new Evaluation of an MLModel

CreateRealtimeEndpoint.name: CreateRealtimeEndpoint
CreateRealtimeEndpoint.description: Creates a real-time endpoint for the MLModel

DeleteBatchPrediction.name: DeleteBatchPrediction
DeleteBatchPrediction.description: Assigns the DELETED status to a BatchPrediction, rendering it unusable

DeleteDataSource.name: DeleteDataSource
DeleteDataSource.description: Assigns the DELETED status to a DataSource, rendering it unusable

DeleteEvaluation.name: DeleteEvaluation
DeleteEvaluation.description: Assigns the DELETED status to an Evaluation, rendering it unusable

DeleteMLModel.name: DeleteMLModel
DeleteMLModel.description: Assigns the DELETED status to an MLModel, rendering it unusable

DeleteRealtimeEndpoint.name: DeleteRealtimeEndpoint
DeleteRealtimeEndpoint.description: Deletes a real time endpoint of an MLModel

DeleteTags.name: DeleteTags
DeleteTags.description:
Deletes the specified tags associated with an ML object. After this operation is complete,
                                                you can't recover deleted tags

DescribeBatchPredictions.name: DescribeBatchPredictions
DescribeBatchPredictions.description:
Returns a list of BatchPrediction operations that match the search criteria in the
                                                request

DescribeDataSources.name: DescribeDataSources
DescribeDataSources.description: Returns a list of DataSource that match the search criteria in the request

DescribeEvaluations.name: DescribeEvaluations
DescribeEvaluations.description: Returns a list of DescribeEvaluations that match the search criteria in the request

DescribeMLModels.name: DescribeMLModels
DescribeMLModels.description: Returns a list of MLModel that match the search criteria in the request

DescribeTags.name: DescribeTags
DescribeTags.description: Describes one or more of the tags for your Amazon ML object

GetBatchPrediction.name: GetBatchPrediction
GetBatchPrediction.description: Returns a BatchPrediction that includes detailed metadata, status, and data file information

GetDataSource.name: GetDataSource
GetDataSource.description:
Returns a DataSource that includes metadata and data file information, as well as
                                                the current status of the DataSource

GetEvaluation.name: GetEvaluation
GetEvaluation.description:
Returns an Evaluation that includes metadata as well as the current status of the
                                                Evaluation

GetMLModel.name: GetMLModel
GetMLModel.description:
Returns an MLModel that includes detailed metadata, and data source information as
                                                well as the current status of the MLModel

Predict.name: Predict
Predict.description: Generates a prediction for the observation using the specified ML Model

UpdateBatchPrediction.name: UpdateBatchPrediction
UpdateBatchPrediction.description: Updates the BatchPredictionName of a BatchPrediction

UpdateDataSource.name: UpdateDataSource
UpdateDataSource.description: Updates the DataSourceName of a DataSource

UpdateEvaluation.name: UpdateEvaluation
UpdateEvaluation.description: Updates the EvaluationName of an Evaluation

UpdateMLModel.name: UpdateMLModel
UpdateMLModel.description: Updates the MLModelName and the ScoreThreshold of an MLModel
